attributes.description:
The BMW X5 brings sporty features to a family SUV, this vehicle can fit the whole family in comfort and style.
The style of this SUV will captivate you from the exterior to the comfortable but stylish interior.
Features of this vehicle include a Multi-Function Steering Wheel, Front and Rear Park Distance Control, Reverse Camera, Paddle-Shift, Cruise Control, Voice Control, Bluetooth Connectivity, Electric Windows, Electric Mirrors, Panoramic Sunroof, Navigation, Air-Conditioning, LED Daytime Driving Lights, Power Steering, Central Locking and much more!
Come in today and test drive this car, IT IS FOR YOU! Don’t delay we will evaluate your existing vehicle for FREE. We will not short-change you. Visit our website to see our full range of stock. A 1% of the value of the vehicle non-refundable deposit, secures the vehicle for two days. If that deposit lapses, You would be required to put another non-refundable deposit to secure it further. Please be aware of scams with fraudsters using other advertiser’s photos. DO NOT pay any deposits unless you deal and pay deposits directly into Primo Executive Cars bank account!
